directions: In a large bowl, whisk the dressing together with the milk, dill, parsley, and scallion until smooth. Add the potatoes and stir until evenly coated. Season with salt and pepper. Chill covered for at least 1 hour (3 hours is best) before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Dressing
2 pounds small red potatoes cooked, cooled, sliced
3 scallions white and green parts, sliced
title: Country Herb Potato Salad
